Product Description:
GERBER Myth Blood Tracker - Hunting

Description:

The perfect shot is hard to make, so the need to track your game once it’s been hit is a reality for most hunters. The telltale sign is blood on the ground but, given dawn or dusk lighting, tracking blood on the ground is easier said than done. That’s why Gerber worked with hunters and engineers to develop the Myth Blood Tracking Light. This small, powerful LED flashlight enhances the color red in low-light situations to simplify tracking your downed animal.
Optimized Spectrum for Fresh Blood
Similar to the way a black or UVA light makes the color white pop, this light’s spectrum is optimized to make fresh blood pop like neon in an environment where there is little naturally occurring red color. The new LED color spectrum is an upgrade from the version used in the original Game Tracker. It’s optimized to highlight blood that’s up to an hour old, and offers enhanced visibility in a broader range of lighting conditions.
Efficient Two-Button Operation
The light offers efficient two-button operation. A single tail button turns the light on, and it’s ready to track. A second, side-mounted button changes the spectrum cast to gray out the field and further enhance the contrast of the blood when you toggle back to primary mode, perfect to help you determine whether you’re still on the blood trail.
Comfortable Rubber Housing
Gerber understands hunting gear is subject to harsh conditions and rough use. The blood tracking light’s rubber outer shell is as durable and lightweight as it is comfortable to handle. It’s big enough to provide solid grip and small enough to fit in a pant cargo pocket or jacket hand pocket.

Features:

- LED light spectrum optimized for blood identification in low-light, low-contrast situations
- Light operates on 4 AA batteries (included)
- LED offers 5.5 hours of continuous runtime
- IPX4 rated; splashing water from any angle will have no harmful effect
- Two-button operation offers switchable lighting to quickly enhance contrast of blood trail
- LED designed specifically to accurately highlight blood
- Lanyard hole on tail end

Specification:

LED Output: 33 lumens, 5.5 hours
Overall Length: 7" (17.78 cm)
Weight: 7.2 oz. (204 g)
Material: Rubber overmold

Product Description:
RIGHT SIDE GEAR Adventure Bracelet

Description:

The Adventure Bracelet from Right Side Gear is made from a light weight but heavy duty rope originally designed as suspension lines of parachutes, thus the name paracord.
Flaunt it: Wear it every day. It looks awesome on your wrist, and it’s a great conversation starter.
Unravel it: Handy in an emergency. Unravel your bracelet to get 8+ feet of 550 type-III military spec paracord, with a breaking strength of 250 kgs.
Survive it: Multi functional and versatile, and its utility is limited only by your imagination.
 The Adventure Bracelet from Right Side Gear can be used in a million different ways. Just google ‘uses of a paracord bracelet’ to understand how a paracord bracelet can save your life. Apart from being a lifestyle/fashion accessory, the bracelet can be made into a pulley, tow rope, tourniquet, shelter, fire starter bow, clothesline, fishing line, trip wire, trail marker, stitching yarn, shoe lace, dental floss, repairing line, leash, raft line, splint, sling, stretcher line.

Features:

- Built from military spec 550 type-III paracord to make sure you are ready when you encounter the unexpected
- The bracelet can be unraveled to get 8+ feet of 550 type-III military spec paracord, with a breaking strength of 250 kgs
- Sturdy Stainless Steel D Shackle and adjustable clasp for easy one hand operation. Powder coating gives the bracelet a raw look and reduces wear and tear
- Available in two size ranges to make sure you get the perfect fit

Specification:

Bracelet Length: Available in 2 sizes; 20-21 cm and 22-23 cm
Total Paracord Length: 8+ to 10+ ft
Material: 550 type-iii military spec paracord

Product Description:
GERBER Cortex Compact Flashlight - Tactical

Description:

The Cortex Compact is designed to be a discreet, everyday carry light for tactical professionals and a backup light for police officers. Running on a single Lithium CR123 battery or AA battery, the Cortex Compact allows the operator to use whatever power source is available. When powered by a CR123, the Cortex Compact provides 125 lumens of output, enough light to momentarily blind an aggressor's night-adapted vision. The Cortex Compact also provides a strobe mode for tactical applications and a low-output mode for navigation. Proudly built in Portland

Features:

- Omnivore Technology – Runs on one CR123 or AA battery
- High, low and strobe modes
- Waterproof (IPX7)
- Pocket Clip
- Tailcap Switch
- Black Anodized Aluminum Body

Specification:

Material: Aluminum
Weight: 2.12 oz.
LED Type: Cree XPG
Batteries: Accepts (1) Lithium CR123 battery or (1) AA battery
Comes with (1) alkaline AA battery.
LITHIUM CR123 BATTERY PERFORMANCE
High Mode Output : 125 lumens
High Mode Runtime : 1.5 hours
Low Mode Output: 25 lumens
Low Mode Runtime : 9 hours
Length: 3.5 inches
AA ALKALINE BATTERY PERFORMANCE
High Output : 60 lumens
High Output Runtime : 1.25 hours
Low Output: 12 lumens
Low Output Runtime : 6 hours
Length: 4.0 inches

Product Description:
PETZL Signal Safety Light

Description:

The SIGNAL safety light allows the user to be visible from a distance. It emits a red light, in either continuous or flashing modes. The 180º multidirectional beam guarantees optimum visibility from up to one kilometer away. The elastic band and clip allow many options for attachment on the headband of another headlamp, around the arm, on a pack, etc. The SiGNAL light is an essential part of any safety equipment for night time activities. It also adapts to every-day activities going to work or school before dawn, walking the dog, etc. Multidirectional performance safety light ensures you are seen from a distance.

Features:

- two red lighting modes (continuous and flashing)
- visible for 1000 m
- 180° visibility
- lasts 120 h in flashing mode and 40 h in continuous lighting mode.
- Reliable
- works in extreme temperatures: - 30 °C to + 60 °C (-22 °F to +140 °F)
- durable
- LED technology
- waterproof down to -1 m.
- Multi-purpose and easy-to-use:
- compact and lightweight: 22 g including batteries
- integrated clip and adjustable strap included
- numerous attachment possibilities: on the head, on a helmet, around the arm, on a pack, etc.
- simple to use switch
- Stable regardless of attachment method:
- clip and tabs on the attachment plate
- Three red LEDs
- Operates with two Lithium CR2032 batteries (included)

Product Description:
MOS-QUIT-O - The Repellent Blanket - Junior

Description:

Mos-Quit-O is a mosquito repellant blanket and revolutionary product designed to provide long-lasting, effective, safe, economical and convenient personal mosquito and insect protection to ensure mosquito-free, safe and sound sleep.
Its unique repellant finish is not only effective; it is odorless, harmless and completely eliminates the worry of harmful effects of conventional repellants.These eco-friendly blankets are both functional and comfortable as they are made using 100% Cotton, with repellency that meets WHO (World Health Organization) Standards.

Features:

- 100% cotton dyed knitted fabric
- Special mosquito repellant finish
- Does not allow mosquito to bite
- Odourless and harmless
- Safe for childrens and pregnant women
- Long lasting repellancy
- Affordable - cost effective
- Repellancy is up to WHO standards
- Environment friendly
- Compact - Easy to carry
- Blanket size

Specification:

Fabric: 100% Cotton
Structure: 34 C double knit Interlock
Dimensions: 75 x 115 cm
Weight: 250 gm
Care Instructions: Hand wash/ Machine Wash, No dry clean. Dry in shade
Age: 6 months +
Advantages:
- 2 in 1 purpose- a Blanket and a mosquito Repellant
- Cozy, Soft and Comfortable
- Compact and Easy to carry
- Can be used in Outdoor Areas
- Can be used in Rooms with Open Windows
- No Overuse of Repellant as in case of Fogging and Spraying
- No Safety Concerns as the Repellant is not directly on your skin but on the fabric
- No Electricity, No Smoke, No Odour and No Harmful Chemicals
- Easy to use
Price Break Up:
The repellency of a Mos-Quit-O Blanket is effective up to 50 washes. Hence, if you wash your blanket once a month it will protect you from mosquito bites for over 4 years. So, you spend less than Rs.1.5 per day and even after 4 years you can continue using it as a regular blanket.
How does it work?
Premium Quality 100% cotton yarn is knitted to form the base of MOS-QUIT-O blanket. An Internationally tested and proven mosquito repellant formulation is applied on this base fabric through factory treatment. This scientific formulation seeps into the fabric and binds itself tightly to each fiber which gives Mos-Quit-O blanket a long lasting, odourless, harmless and effective repellency that meets WHO standards.

Product Description:
MOS-QUIT-O - The Repellent Blanket

Description:

Mos-Quit-O is a mosquito repellant blanket and revolutionary product designed to provide long-lasting, effective, safe, economical and convenient personal mosquito and insect protection to ensure mosquito-free, safe and sound sleep.
Its unique repellant finish is not only effective; it is odorless, harmless and completely eliminates the worry of harmful effects of conventional repellants.These eco-friendly blankets are both functional and comfortable as they are made using 100% Cotton, with repellency that meets WHO (World Health Organization) Standards.

Features:

- 100% cotton dyed knitted fabric
- Special mosquito repellant finish
- Does not allow mosquito to bite
- Odourless and harmless
- Safe for childrens and pregnant women
- Long lasting repellancy
- Affordable - cost effective
- Repellancy is up to WHO standards
- Environment friendly
- Compact - Easy to carry
- Blanket size

Specification:

Fabric: 100% Cotton
Structure: 34 C double knit Interlock
Dimensions: 140 x 210 cm
Weight: 1000 gm
Care Instructions: Hand wash/ Machine Wash, No dry clean. Dry in shade
Advantages:
- 2 in 1 purpose- a Blanket and a mosquito Repellant
- Cozy, Soft and Comfortable
- Compact and Easy to carry
- Can be used in Outdoor Areas
- Can be used in Rooms with Open Windows
- No Overuse of Repellant as in case of Fogging and Spraying
- No Safety Concerns as the Repellant is not directly on your skin but on the fabric
- No Electricity, No Smoke, No Odour and No Harmful Chemicals
- Easy to use
Price Break Up:
The repellency of a Mos-Quit-O Blanket is effective up to 50 washes. Hence, if you wash your blanket once a month it will protect you from mosquito bites for over 4 years. So, you spend less than Rs.1.5 per day and even after 4 years you can continue using it as a regular blanket.
How does it work?
Premium Quality 100% cotton yarn is knitted to form the base of MOS-QUIT-O blanket. An Internationally tested and proven mosquito repellant formulation is applied on this base fabric through factory treatment. This scientific formulation seeps into the fabric and binds itself tightly to each fiber which gives Mos-Quit-O blanket a long lasting, odourless, harmless and effective repellency that meets WHO standards.

Product Description:
GERBER Compact Sport - Multi-Plier 400 - Tactical

Description:

There is justice in the world of Gerber multi-tools. Because while the Compact Sport may be the smaller, less formidable version of our Multi-Plier 600 series, this Multi-Plier 400 series compensates by being our most popular tool.
This is no small victory. After all, our ultra compact workhorse brings all the same functionality and rugged performance characteristics of its big brother. Thanks to its stainless steel hardware. And its Fiskars scissors, which have the wherewithal to cut through seat belts. And thanks, as well, to the patented design of its one-handed opening pliers.
The Compact is unmatched for strength, durability and ease of use. Our patented Saf.T.Plus locking system is your assurance that this little guy more than holds its own in the name of user safety. That is to say, your safety.

Features:

- Flick of the wrist, one-handed opening pliers.
- Compact, lighweight, non-reflective coating.
- Patented Saf.T.Plus.

- Needlenose pliers
- Wire cutter
- Wire crimper
- Serrated knife blade
- Fiskars scissors
- Cross point screwdriver
- Small, medium and large flat blade screwdrivers
- Can opener
- Bottle opener
Overall Length: 5.55"
Closed Length: 4.37"
Weight: 6.6 oz.
Handle Material: Stainless Steel

Product Name: GERBER LMF II Survival- Coyote Brown - Tactical
Product Description:
GERBER LMF II Survival- Coyote Brown - Tactical

Description:

Down behind enemy lines? Left to fend for yourself? These are the scenarios that inspired the LMF II. Former military man, Jeff Freeman led the charge to engineer this fearless new 10" survival knife. And we field-tested with the troops. This knife is as adaptable as the personnel who carry it. Use it to cut through the skin of a fuselage. Or sever a seat belt. Or egress through the Plexiglas of a chopper. Plus, the LMF II does a slick job cutting firewood and building shelter. The over-molded handle successfully limits blistering. There is complete separation between the tang and butt cap, so the knife absorbs the shocks from hammering and prevents the shocks of electricity. Smartly situated grooves and lashing holes let the LMF II convert to a spear. The low-profile sheath facilitates movement, limits noise, works for parachuting, and attaches to a belt or MOLLE vest. The patented, integrated sharpener means edge retention in the field.

Features:

- Rugged, versatile survival tool
- Safety knife included
- Low-profile sheath with built-in sharpener
- 2 Leg Straps
- Sheath
- Strap Cutter
- MOLLE Compatible

Specification:

Overall Length: 26.9 cm
Blade Length: 12.3 cm
Weight: 688 g (w/ Sheath)
Weight: 331 g (w/o Sheath)
Blade Style: Drop Point
Blade Material: 420HC Stainless
Blade Type: Serrated
Handle Material: Glass-filled nylon with TPV overmold
Sheath Material: Ballistic nylon with fire retardant coating
Option Set: GERBER LMF II Survival- Coyote Brown - Tactical

Product Description:
QUIPCO Bolide Lantern

Description:

The Bolide lantern is a great source of light for the outdoors as well as indoors. It has a detachable upper hook, which allows you to use it as a floor / table lamp or hang it as a lantern in a tent. The lantern is easily portable and compact to carry during camping, motorbiking or any other indoor / outdoor activity.

Features:

Specification:

Material: High quality ABS plastic material, with opaque clarity for diffused light output.
Modes: White light or Red light mode.
Multi Purpose: Can be used as a table lamp or hanging lantern.
Range: 2 m range in white mode.
Battery Life: 100 h (white) 160 h (red)
Weight: 230 g.
Power: 0.4 W.
Power Source: 4AA Batteries
Flourescent Switch: Glows in the dark, so it is easily visible in the night
Dimensions: 11 cm x 17 cm
Maintenance: Remove batteries when not in use for long periods of time.
Care Instructions: Keep away from fire, high temperature and leakage.

Product Description:
RIGHT SIDE GEAR Adventure Bracelet

Description:

The Adventure Bracelet from Right Side Gear is made from a light weight but heavy duty rope originally designed as suspension lines of parachutes, thus the name paracord.
Flaunt it: Wear it every day. It looks awesome on your wrist, and it’s a great conversation starter.
Unravel it: Handy in an emergency. Unravel your bracelet to get 8+ feet of 550 type-III military spec paracord, with a breaking strength of 250 kgs.
Survive it: Multi functional and versatile, and its utility is limited only by your imagination.
 The Adventure Bracelet from Right Side Gear can be used in a million different ways. Just google ‘uses of a paracord bracelet’ to understand how a paracord bracelet can save your life. Apart from being a lifestyle/fashion accessory, the bracelet can be made into a pulley, tow rope, tourniquet, shelter, fire starter bow, clothesline, fishing line, trip wire, trail marker, stitching yarn, shoe lace, dental floss, repairing line, leash, raft line, splint, sling, stretcher line.

Features:

- Built from military spec 550 type-III paracord to make sure you are ready when you encounter the unexpected
- The bracelet can be unraveled to get 8+ feet of 550 type-III military spec paracord, with a breaking strength of 250 kgs
- Sturdy Stainless Steel D Shackle and adjustable clasp for easy one hand operation. Powder coating gives the bracelet a raw look and reduces wear and tear
- Available in two size ranges to make sure you get the perfect fit

Specification:

Bracelet Length: Available in 2 sizes; 20-21 cm and 22-23 cm
Total Paracord Length: 8+ to 10+ ft
Material: 550 type-iii military spec paracord

Product Description:
PETZL Tikkina®² Headlamp

Description:

The TIKKINA ² headlamp is designed to meet everyday lighting needs. It has two lighting modes (maximum and economic) to adapt light quantity to the situation. It is also equipped with new, improved performance LEDs and a push-button switch. The compartment now has an easy-to-use system that allows the user to very easily change the batteries or to equip the headlamp with the ADAPT mounting system.

Features:

- 2 LEDs create a wide beam that reaches up to 23m; low level provides up to 190 hrs. of use and high up to 55 hrs.
- Push-button switch lets you easily change between 2 lighting modes (high and low) so you can choose the appropriate light level for the task at hand.
- Headlamp tilts to point light where you need it.
- Provides IPX4 water resistance for reliability in inclement weather.
- Adjustable elastic headband holds the light securely in place; colorful headband and plastic casing add a little style.
- Compatible with the Petzl Adapt Tikka 2 system (not included), which allows you to quickly and easily attach the light in a variety of places.
- Battery compartment is hinged to allow simpler access than the previous version of the Tikkina; compartment closes easily and securely.
- Runs on 3 AAA alkaline batteries, included.

Specification:

Bulb type: LED
Bulb detail: 2 LEDs
Weight with batteries: 2.8 ounces
Dimensions: 2.25 x 1.5 x 1.5 inches
Light output: 23 lumens
Maximum beam distance: High: 23 / low: 13 meters
Brightness levels: 2
Beam type: Flood  
Battery life at 70 degrees: High: 55 / low: 190 hours
Batteries: 3 AAA
Material(s): Plastic
Rechargeable: No
Colour: Green, Orange, Blue, Pink
NOTE: Manufacturer Instructions: Petzl warns against using lithium batteries with this headlamp as doing so might cause the lamp to overheat and damage the LEDs.

Product Description:
LED LENSER SEO 7R LED Headlight

Description:

Now, get the technology you want in a compact, lightweight and rechargeable design. Featuring our German-engineered OPTISENSE Technology™, the SEO 7R will sense the light level in your surrounding area and will adjust its brightness automatically to save battery life and give you light when you need it, without taking your hands from your task. A red LED preserves your night vision and helps to make sure you stay safe while enjoying the activities you love. Get it all with the SEO 7R!

Features:

Specification:

Advanced Focus System™: Traditionally, light-focusing systems have consisted of either a lens, or a reflector. The Advanced Focus System (AFS) is the patented combination of a reflector AND lens to create a light system that provides both a focused beam for long-distance and a homogenous spill-beam for up-close reading. AFS means whether you’re reading a map up close or focusing down the path to a landmark in the distance, your light will be easy on the eyes, clear and bright.
Smart Light Technology (Basic): Smart Light Technology allows you to program your light functions to the task at hand. Three light functions (Power, Low Power, and Defense Strobe) are easily operated with full or half clicks, ensuring your focus will be on the job, not on your light.
Luminous Flux: 220 lm
Lighting Duration: 5 hours
Batteries: Lithium ion battery
Weight: 3.70 oz
Energy Reservoir: 3.2 watts
Lighting Range: 142 yards
LED: High End Power LED and Red High End LED
Package Contents: Batteries, charger, washable headband, snap-lock, operating instructions.

Product Description:
PETZL Tikka Plus®² Headlamp

Description:

Headlamp with 1 high-output LED, 1 red LED and five lighting modes (three continuous and two strobe).

Features:

Specification:

Versatile and powerful:
- Three white lighting modes (maximum, economic and flashing mode).
- Two red lighting modes: continuous and strobe.
- type of lighting (white or red) is selected by pressing for two seconds on the push-button (the last mode used remains in the memory until the next use).
One high-output white LED:
- 50 lumens (maximum level).
- Shines up to 35 meters (maximum level).
- 140 h light duration at economic level.
- Specific Petzl lens optimizes the reach of the beam and maximizes versatility.
Easy to use:
- Electronic push-button switch.
- Battery pack is easy to open.
- Light beam can be aimed.
- ADAPT system is quick to mount.
Reliable:
- Push-button switch limits inadvertently turning on the lamp during storage.
- Battery charge indicator light (comes on when the headlamp illuminates for less than 5 m and there is
only 50 % burn-time remaining for proximity lighting).
Compatible with lithium batteries:
- Lighter than alkaline batteries.
- Better performance at lower temperatures.
Compact, light and comfortable:
- Single compartment contains LEDs and batteries.
- Adjustable headband.

Product Name: AQUAPAC Mini Bike-Mounted Waterproof Phone Case - Fits Screen Sizes upto 5.5
Product Description:
AQUAPAC Mini Bike-Mounted Waterproof Phone Case - Fits Screen Sizes upto 5.5

Description:

Attach your Phone or GPS securely to your handlebars. Use it to take video, or to keep track of your mapping app.
You can also attach it to the helm bar on a yacht, or to a windsurfing boom.

Features:

- No tools required - designed to be attached with your fingers only.
- You'll be able to talk and hear without a problem, through the special plastic (TPU). And you can get great video with your front-facing camera.
(Note: The bike mount attachment means that there is no room to fit a lens window on the back of this case, so you cannot use a rear-facing/iSight camera. Sorry!)
- It'll protect your phone from mud and dirt as well as water.
- Most phones will float in this case - but make sure you test yours in a basin before you launch it into the sea!
- The seams are high-frequency welded to form a super-strong bond.
- The Aquaclip® (a patented, ultra-secure, rustproof plastic seal) opens and closes with a simple twist of two levers. And everything stays in one piece even when it's open.

Specification:

Waterproof Rating: IPX8. Click here for details.
Materials Case: TPU
Mount: nylon and stainless steel
Weight Case: 1.5oz / 44g
Mount: 1.3oz / 36g
Suitable for: Fits all iPhones except the 6 Plus. And similar-sized Android phones and other phones

Note: If you have a bumper case on your phone and want to keep it on when it's in the Aquapac, you'll probably require a wider case.

Product Description:
LED LENSER SEO 5 LED Headlight

Description:

Power and versatility in one package! The SEO 5 shines bright with 180 lumens on high, a red LED for preserving night vision, and a high end power white LED with flash function and a swiveling head that ensures you'll have light where you want it, when you want it. The Advanced Focus System™ allows for a close up spot or a wider beam, making the SEO 5 a flexible, lightweight, and technology centered headlamp for any sport, hobby or job.

Features:

Specification:

Advanced Focus System™: Traditionally, light-focusing systems have consisted of either a lens, or a reflector. The Advanced Focus System (AFS) is the patented combination of a reflector AND lens to create a light system that provides both a focused beam for long-distance and a homogenous spill-beam for up-close reading. AFS means whether you’re reading a map up close or focusing down the path to a landmark in the distance, your light will be easy on the eyes, clear and bright.
Smart Light Technology Basic: Smart Light Technology allows you to program your light functions to the task at hand. Three light functions (Power, Low Power, and Defense Strobe) are easily operated with full or half clicks, ensuring your focus will be on the job, not on your light.
Luminous Flux: 180 lm
Lighting Duration: 7 hours
Batteries: 3 x AAA
Weight: 3.70 oz
Energy Reservoir: 5.4 watts
Lighting Range: 142 yards
LED: High End Power LED and Red High End LED
Package Contents: Batteries, washable headband, snap-lock, operating instructions.

Product Name: AQUAPAC Stormproof Case for iPod – Orange
Product Description:
AQUAPAC Stormproof Case for iPod – Orange

Description:

Whether you're trail-running, snowboarding or cycling keeping your iPod dry is a no-brainer with our new rainproof case. A simple rain-flap allows you to insert your headphones (or Aquapac's waterproof headphones!) and as long as the case is hanging from its lanyard, a carabiner or in an armband it's weatherproof.

Features:

Specification:

Materials: 70D PU-Coated Ripstop Nylon with welded seams
Waterproof Rating: IPX3. Click here for details.
General Information:
- Manufactured from TPU-coated Ripstop Nylon, it features welded seams and a classic 3-roll seal with micro-buckle.
- Guaranteed waterproof to IPX3 (hard rain) when upright.
- Available in a choice of Hot Orange or Cool Grey.
What does 'StormproofTM' Mean?
The roll-seal system used on this Aquapac has been used successfully on drybags for years. With a very simple 3 or 4 folds of the opening and then clipping 2 buckles in place, you can guarantee that the hardest rain or spray will be kept off your expensive gear. Whilst we don't recommend that you submerge our Stormproof pouches, they should also protect against accidental dropping into puddles if they're retrieved quickly.
What Size do I need?
A perfect fit for iPhone, iPod Touch and Classic iPod, as well as other brands. The headphone port takes headphone jacks of up to 5mm diameter.

Product Name: SAS TEC SC-1 / 01 Shoulder Protector - Pair
Product Description:
SAS TEC SC-1 / 01 Shoulder Protector - Pair

Description:

The protectors are made of Viscoelastic foam with memory effect and outstanding shock absorption values. After an impact or any kind of deformation the foam (protector) returns to its original shape within shortly. The air which is embedded in the foam´s cells provoke a progressive absorption. The protector remains soft in case of slowly increasing forces, however when it comes to a fast heavy impact the resistance of the foam grows with increasing speed.
We recommend this protector in textile jacket shoulders.

Features:

- Protectors surpass the required values of EN 1621-1:2012, level 2
- Protectors are not destroyed by an impact and can still be used
- Protectors are lightweight
- Protectors are washable (remove, hand launder separately / water absorption less than one per cent)
- Protectors can be used between the temperature range of -20*c to +100*C.
- At high temperature, protector becomes softer and at freezing temperature, it becomes harder
- Optimal for breathable textile clothing due to the ventilation openings.
- High-end engineering for greater safety.
- Protectors are symmetrical
- Protectors are sold as a pair

Specification:

Article: SC-1/01
Weight: ca. 55 g / item
Dimensions (L/W/H):  ca. 200/160/11 mm
Protection level: 2 (mean value below 20 kN)
Option Set: SAS TEC SC-1 / 01 Shoulder Protector - Pair

Product Description:
SEA SPECS Crystal Specs

Description:

Black lightweight frames, with standard clear lenses. 100% UVA & UVB Protection lightweight, extreme sunglasses specifically designed for outdoor watersports...

Features:

Specification:

SeaSpecs Patented Extreme Secure Strap:
SeaSpecs Non-elastic, Easily Adjustable and Comfortable Secure Strap keeps SeaSpecs on your head during your Extreme Surfing, Kite Surfing, Windsurfing, Jet Skiing, Snowboarding and all other Extreme Sports!
SeaSpecs are made for Extreme Conditions, therefore our patented strap is not removable!:
Removeable straps will fall apart under Extreme Conditions.  Insist on a Non-Removable Strap!  Beware of using a leash instead of a Non-Removable Secure Strap. Sunglass leashes are designed to be worn around your neck. Never wear a leash/noose around your neck during Extreme Sports!
SeaSpecs Patented Extreme Lenses:
Our Crystal Specs come standard with our Clear Patented, High-Quality, Impact-Resistant, Non-Polarized Lenses and provide 100% UVA & UVB Protection! All SeaSpecs Extreme Lenses meet or exceed all applicable United States, European, Australian and many other countrys' regulations.
SeaSpecs Patented Injection Molded Nylon Frame and Hinges:
SeaSpecs Patented Injection Molded Nylon Frame is made for Extreme Conditions and is extremely strong, yet lightweight. SeaSpecs Hinges are an integral part of our Frame and are also made of Nylon, thereby making SeaSpecs hinges as strong as our frame. SeaSpecs Do Not use metal hinges, because Metal Hinges Will Rust and fall apart.
SeaSpecs Patented Full Wrap-Around Frame:
All SeaSpecs utilize our Patented Full Wrap-Around Frame which provide Complete Coverage of your eyes and keep sunlight and spray out of your eyes during Extreme Conditions.
SeaSpecs Frames are Ventilated!:

What does 'StormproofTM' Mean?

Product Description:
AQUAPAC Wet & Dry Waterproof Backpack – 15L

Description:

Whether you're commuting in the rain or canyoning down a waterfall, this is a fully-featured waterproof backpack that will protect your gear from the elements.

Features:

- Full-size waterproof internal pocket - Allows you to separate your wet and dry things (or dirty and clean things) stowed safely in the same bag.
- Internal pockets in yellow - So you can see to the bottom of the bag easily.
- Clear key pocket - No need to scrabble around inside the bag for those small items.
- External mesh-pockets - Keep a bottle or pump quick and easy to get to.

Specification:

Colour: Black with Hot Orange Lashtab surround.
Materials: 210D PU-Coated Fabrics Taped Seams
Waterproof Rating: IPX6. Click here for details.
General Information:
- TPU-coated fabric with taped seams - Water can't seep in through the seams, even where they are sewn.
- Proven roll-seal - Quick and easy closure which provides excellent sealing against the elements.
- Removable back support/seat - Take it out to dry it quickly after a soaking, or protect yourself when sitting on rough terrain.
- Pocket can be used for hydration bladder - Add in a bladder and clip the hose to the carabiner supplied, to stay hydrated on the trail.
- Integral light-lash - Add a light to your back, or clip on your helmet to stay hands-free.
- Breathable mesh straps - Quick-drying and breathable mesh straps are lightweight and comfortable.
- Reflective logo print - Be seen at night with reflective ink on your back, but be subtle in daylight.
- Sternum and waist straps - Keep the backpack securely in place when you are moving on the trail. And remove the waist strap if you don't need it.
- Carabiner lashes - So you can attach your map-case, water-bottle or safety equipment to keep it convenient and hands-free.
- 100% PVC-Free - Stays supple and crack-free even when it's really cold.
What does 'StormproofTM' Mean?
The roll-seal system used on this Aquapac has been used successfully on drybags for years. With a very simple 3 or 4 folds of the opening and then clipping 2 buckles in place, you can guarantee that the hardest rain or spray will be kept off your expensive gear. Whilst we don't recommend that you submerge our Stormproof pouches, they should also protect against accidental dropping into puddles if they're retrieved quickly.
What Size do I need?
The Backpack has a 15 Litre capacity. This is enough to carry a 17" Laptop, a change of clothes and a small lunch. The external mesh pockets will each hold a 2L water bottle, magazine or tripod. The lashtabs on each chest strap and main bag are enough to carabiner on a bicycle helmet or pouch.

Product Description:
MOTOTECH Contour Air Riding Jacket

Description:

MOTOTECH Contour Air Riding Jacket -The MotoTech contour air is an Urban Riding Jacket, which combines a sporty and vintage style look with a smooth surface that isn't prone to snagging and tearing. Made from Waxed cotton, a unique high-performance fabric probably second only to leather in the class of true outdoor fabrics in its ability to block the wind, it is a sustainable and an earth-friendly resource . It is made by weaving 2-ply cotton yarn into a strong canvas fabric, which is then treated with a proprietary mixture of micro and technical waxes. This wax treatment creates a high water resistant barrier, while maintaining the breathability of the cotton. There is ample mesh around the stomach, under arms and back to let the air pass through for ventilation.

MOTOTECH Hurricane Rain Jacket - Mototech Hurricane Rain Jacket is designed and made for protection against rain and wind. It is highly water resistant, lightweight and compact.This extra jacket can be your perfect partner for riding on rainy day. 

NOTE :- This MOTOTECH Contour Air Riding Jacket comes with MOTOTECH Hurricane Rain Jacket as one unit.

Features:

MOTOTECH Contour Air Riding Jacket
- Independent Fleece Vest liner (can be worn separately)
- Multiple utility pockets: 2 waist pockets, 2 chest pockets, 1 inner chest pocket, 1 right forearm pocket
- 3M reflectors on the chest pockets and back for higher visibility.
- YKK Zippers
- Wooden Hangers for convenient storage
- Sas-Tec Protectors with High-end engineering for greater safety.

MOTOTECH Hurricane Rain Jacket
- Brand print on the back is Reflective. 
- Draw cords are Hi Viz Orange. 
- Front opening has velcro, backed by Hi Viz orange waterproof fabric for added waterproofing (NO zip on front for HIGHER waterproofing).
- All seams are taped for maximum waterproofing. 
- Super tough coated fabric for long term usage. 
- Backed by enviable quality and service of MOTOTECH - Indias Premium Motorcycle Gear.

Specification:

MOTOTECH Contour Air Riding Jacket Material: Waxed Cotton - Breathable, Burn Resistance and Abrasion Resistance material.
Advantages of Waxed Cotton:
- It is somewhat burn-resistant, albeit still certainly flammable. If you’re sleeping by a campfire or welding in the shop, a few small sparks or hot ashes won’t ruin the fabric, unlike nylon or other synthetics that end up with tiny pinholes everywhere in the same situation.
- It lasts much longer when exposed to the elements than most petroleum based fabrics. UV exposure will degrade most synthetic fabrics much faster than Waxed Cotton fabrics.
- It is softer than most synthetic fabrics like nylon or polyester, making Waxed Cotton significantly less abrasive to auto and moto paint finishes.
- It is also more gentle on bare skin. You usually don't buff your car or wipe yourself dry with a synthetic fabric - you use cotton!
Sas Tec Protectors: The protectors are made of Viscoelastic foam with memory effect and outstanding shock absorption values. After an impact or any kind of deformation the foam (protector) returns to its original shape within shortly. The air which is embedded in the foam´s cells provoke a progressive absorption. The protector remains soft in case of slowly increasing forces, however when it comes to a fast heavy impact the resistance of the foam grows with increasing speed.
To Know More about Sas-Tec..
- Optimal for breathable textile clothing due to the ventilation openings.
- Protectors are lightweight and are not destroyed on impact and can still be used.
- Protectors are washable (remove, hand launder separately / water absorption less than one per cent)
- Protectors can be used between the temperature range of -20*c to +100*C.
Protection level: Protectors surpass the required values of EN 1621-1:2012 (mean value below 20 kN)
Elbow Protector's Weight: ca. 72 g / item
Elbow Protector's Dimensions (L/W/H):  ca. 250/160/11 mm
Shoulder Protector's Weight: ca. 55 g / item
Shoulder Protector's Dimensions (L/W/H): ca. 200/160/11 mm

WAX COTTON CARE INSTRUCTIONS
The proper care and treatment of your waxed cotton garment will ensure its longevity. When you are not wearing your garment, always be sure to hang it in a well-ventilated area. Dried mud, sand, grit and dirt should be removed as soon as possible, as it will have an abrasive effect on the waxed cotton.
Variations in texture and shade are intrinsic qualities of such materials and should not be regarded as defects.
CLASSIC AND LIGHTWEIGHT WAX COTTON
Cleaning:
Regular cleaning not only enhances the appearance of your garment but removes dust and dirt that can cause premature wear. Regular cleaning also prevents dirt build-up from becoming irremovable stains.
- REMOVE dried mud, sand and grit as soon as possible especially along inner sleeve seams, as these is abrasive.
- HOSE OFF or SPONGE WIPE with cold water only. If dirt is ground in, gently brush it off with a soft bristled brush and then rinse.
- HANG TO DRY naturally and completely for at least 24 hours in a dry, well-ventilated area.
DO NOT dry clean • DO NOT machine wash • DO NOT tumble dry (no dryer) • DO NOT use soap or detergent of any kind • DO NOT use solvents or bleach • DO NOT iron or starch • DO NOT force dry or expose to a direct flame • DO NOT expose to direct sunlight for a long period of time (such as rear car window).
Doing any of these will damage or remove the proofing and may void the garment’s warranty.
Cleaning Steps:
1. Dip in Cold Water (Room Temperature Water).
2. Rub the dirty area with soft fabric cleaning brush.
3. Drip Dry.
4. Your rejuvenated jacket is ready to use.
How to Store Your Wax Cotton Garment:
To ensure the longevity or your wax cotton coat or jacket, be sure to only store clean, perfectly dried garments. Items stored not completely dried or stored in a humid area may very well develop mildew. Once stored, regularly inspect your garment for mildew or mildew-indicating smell to prevent damage from occurring to your garment. To store your coat or jacket hang it in a dry, cool and well-ventilated space, or fold and roll your garment for storage in a dry, cool and well-ventilated space.

Product Description:
MOTOTECH Contour Air Riding Jacket

Description:

MOTOTECH Contour Air Riding Jacket -The MotoTech contour air is an Urban Riding Jacket, which combines a sporty and vintage style look with a smooth surface that isn't prone to snagging and tearing. Made from Waxed cotton, a unique high-performance fabric probably second only to leather in the class of true outdoor fabrics in its ability to block the wind, it is a sustainable and an earth-friendly resource . It is made by weaving 2-ply cotton yarn into a strong canvas fabric, which is then treated with a proprietary mixture of micro and technical waxes. This wax treatment creates a high water resistant barrier, while maintaining the breathability of the cotton. There is ample mesh around the stomach, under arms and back to let the air pass through for ventilation.

MOTOTECH Hurricane Rain Jacket - Mototech Hurricane Rain Jacket is designed and made for protection against rain and wind. It is highly water resistant, lightweight and compact.This extra jacket can be your perfect partner for riding on rainy day. 

NOTE :- This MOTOTECH Contour Air Riding Jacket comes with MOTOTECH Hurricane Rain Jacket as one unit.

Features:

MOTOTECH Contour Air Riding Jacket
- Independent Fleece Vest liner (can be worn separately)
- Multiple utility pockets: 2 waist pockets, 2 chest pockets, 1 inner chest pocket, 1 right forearm pocket
- 3M reflectors on the chest pockets and back for higher visibility.
- YKK Zippers
- Wooden Hangers for convenient storage
- Sas-Tec Protectors with High-end engineering for greater safety.

MOTOTECH Hurricane Rain Jacket
- Brand print on the back is Reflective. 
- Draw cords are Hi Viz Orange. 
- Front opening has velcro, backed by Hi Viz orange waterproof fabric for added waterproofing (NO zip on front for HIGHER waterproofing).
- All seams are taped for maximum waterproofing. 
- Super tough coated fabric for long term usage. 
- Backed by enviable quality and service of MOTOTECH - Indias Premium Motorcycle Gear.

Specification:

MOTOTECH Contour Air Riding Jacket Material: Waxed Cotton - Breathable, Burn Resistance and Abrasion Resistance material.
Advantages of Waxed Cotton:
- It is somewhat burn-resistant, albeit still certainly flammable. If you’re sleeping by a campfire or welding in the shop, a few small sparks or hot ashes won’t ruin the fabric, unlike nylon or other synthetics that end up with tiny pinholes everywhere in the same situation.
- It lasts much longer when exposed to the elements than most petroleum based fabrics. UV exposure will degrade most synthetic fabrics much faster than Waxed Cotton fabrics.
- It is softer than most synthetic fabrics like nylon or polyester, making Waxed Cotton significantly less abrasive to auto and moto paint finishes.
- It is also more gentle on bare skin. You usually don't buff your car or wipe yourself dry with a synthetic fabric - you use cotton!
Sas Tec Protectors: The protectors are made of Viscoelastic foam with memory effect and outstanding shock absorption values. After an impact or any kind of deformation the foam (protector) returns to its original shape within shortly. The air which is embedded in the foam´s cells provoke a progressive absorption. The protector remains soft in case of slowly increasing forces, however when it comes to a fast heavy impact the resistance of the foam grows with increasing speed.
To Know More about Sas-Tec..
- Optimal for breathable textile clothing due to the ventilation openings.
- Protectors are lightweight and are not destroyed on impact and can still be used.
- Protectors are washable (remove, hand launder separately / water absorption less than one per cent)
- Protectors can be used between the temperature range of -20*c to +100*C.
Protection level: Protectors surpass the required values of EN 1621-1:2012 (mean value below 20 kN)
Elbow Protector's Weight: ca. 72 g / item
Elbow Protector's Dimensions (L/W/H):  ca. 250/160/11 mm
Shoulder Protector's Weight: ca. 55 g / item
Shoulder Protector's Dimensions (L/W/H): ca. 200/160/11 mm

WAX COTTON CARE INSTRUCTIONS
The proper care and treatment of your waxed cotton garment will ensure its longevity. When you are not wearing your garment, always be sure to hang it in a well-ventilated area. Dried mud, sand, grit and dirt should be removed as soon as possible, as it will have an abrasive effect on the waxed cotton.
Variations in texture and shade are intrinsic qualities of such materials and should not be regarded as defects.
CLASSIC AND LIGHTWEIGHT WAX COTTON
Cleaning:
Regular cleaning not only enhances the appearance of your garment but removes dust and dirt that can cause premature wear. Regular cleaning also prevents dirt build-up from becoming irremovable stains.
- REMOVE dried mud, sand and grit as soon as possible especially along inner sleeve seams, as these is abrasive.
- HOSE OFF or SPONGE WIPE with cold water only. If dirt is ground in, gently brush it off with a soft bristled brush and then rinse.
- HANG TO DRY naturally and completely for at least 24 hours in a dry, well-ventilated area.
DO NOT dry clean • DO NOT machine wash • DO NOT tumble dry (no dryer) • DO NOT use soap or detergent of any kind • DO NOT use solvents or bleach • DO NOT iron or starch • DO NOT force dry or expose to a direct flame • DO NOT expose to direct sunlight for a long period of time (such as rear car window).
Doing any of these will damage or remove the proofing and may void the garment’s warranty.
Cleaning Steps:
1. Dip in Cold Water (Room Temperature Water).
2. Rub the dirty area with soft fabric cleaning brush.
3. Drip Dry.
4. Your rejuvenated jacket is ready to use.
How to Store Your Wax Cotton Garment:
To ensure the longevity or your wax cotton coat or jacket, be sure to only store clean, perfectly dried garments. Items stored not completely dried or stored in a humid area may very well develop mildew. Once stored, regularly inspect your garment for mildew or mildew-indicating smell to prevent damage from occurring to your garment. To store your coat or jacket hang it in a dry, cool and well-ventilated space, or fold and roll your garment for storage in a dry, cool and well-ventilated space.

Product Description:
CAMELBAK M.U.L.E.® 100oz / 3L

Description:

There’s a reason this is one of our bestselling, longest-running packs: it’s got everything you need, and nothing you don’t. The M.U.L.E.® has a narrow-gauge design that keeps it light and maneuverable—so even when it’s fully loaded for a day of mountain biking, it won’t get in your way.
Since we launched the first M.U.L.E. in 1996, mountain bikers have been telling us that it hits the sweet spot of size vs. storage: it’s lightweight, but big enough to carry three liters of water and a day’s worth of snacks and gear. Over the years, we’ve also added air channels to keep your back cool, plus clever compartments for stashing tools, keys and electronics.

Features:

Specification:

Total Capacity: 671 cu in / 11L + 3L Reservoir
Total Weight: 1.7 lbs / .77 kg (pack only)
Dimensions: 18 x 8 x 8 in / 45.5 x 20 x 20.5 cm
Torso Length: 15 in / 38.5 cm
Back Panel: XV
Harness: Independent Suspension™ and Slider™ Sternum Strap
Belt: Removable 20mm / .75" stability
Fabric: 70D Diamond Clarus & 420 Nylon with DWR + 1000 mm PU
Antidote® Reservoir Features:
Quick Link™ System, 1/4 turn - easy open/close cap, lightweight fillport, dryer arms, center baffling and low-profile design, patented Big Bite™ Valve, HydroGuard™ technology, PureFlow™ tube, easy-to-clean wide-mouth opening
Key Pack Features:
Media pocket, bike tool organizer pocket, stash pocket, four point compression, stretch overflow helmet storage
Designed to Carry:
Helmet, multi-tool, pump, spare tube, extra layer, lunch, MP3, phone, wallet, keys

Product Description:
GERBER GDC Zip Driver - Essentials

Description:

The screw is a glorious little invention, but damn if they don’t come loose (or worse, refuse to budge) from time to time—and always at the worst time. Gerber’s Daily Carry Zip Driver is a compact, simplified tool that attaches to a jacket or bag, so it’s there whenever you need to take on a stubborn screw. At home, use it to tighten a pair of glasses or an escaping frying pan handle. At work, stealthily fix that annoying bathroom door.
Four Tools In One
This palm-sized driver’s rotating wheel holds the four most commonly used screwdriver heads—two flat and two Phillips. Snap one into place, and a ball detent mechanism locks it tight enough to take on the oldest, rustiest screw. The quick-release clip lets you quickly pop it on and off a zipper or a pack strap, and the compact size means even screws tucked out of sight and barely in reach are in the line of fire.

Features:

- 2 flat head drivers (1/8" Bit & 3/16" Bit)
- 2 Phillips head drivers (#1 Bit & #2 Bit)
- Ball detent locking mechanism for added security
- Zipper attachment for easy access
- Quick-release clip for swift removal

Specification:

Overall Length: 2.15"
Steel Type: 420 Stainless
Handle Material: 3Cr13

Product Description:
GERBER GDC Zip Light+ - Essentials

Description:

Long is the night, and longer still the walk back home when you’re caught out without the proper tools. The Gerber Daily Carry Zip Light keeps illumination near at hand, whether you’re close to home or miles from nowhere. Its compact size and reliable clip let you attach it to a zipper, pack or keychain, and then forget about it—until you really need a light.
Light Bright
The beauty behind this compact tool is simple: A super bright beam that lives nearby, and can be used to light your way should darkness or other hurdles emerge. It’s equally at home handling life’s non-emergencies—use it to locate items swallowed by your backpack or shoulder bag, or to stealthily recover dropped possessions from underneath a theater seat.
A Multi-purpose Tool

Product Description:
GERBER GDC Zip Hex - Essentials

Description:

Hex head screws are everywhere, and especially on your gear: bikes, boards, skis and ATVs. In short, all the important stuff. Keep adjustability close at hand with one compact, solid hex tool. Gerber’s Daily Carry Zip Hex has better grip than your fingernails, more versatility than your keys and is stronger than both of them combined. Don’t let the lack of the right tool spoil a good day outdoors.
Five Tools In One
The palm-sized hex’s rotating wheel holds the five most commonly used metric Allen wrenches. Stem bolts, binding attachments, furniture, exercise equipment—no matter what you’re working on, the Zip Hex can help.
Choose a bit, snap it into place, and a ball detent mechanism locks it in place. The lightweight, grippy handle resists slippage, and the stainless steel bits will hold up to serious torque.
Made To Be Mobile
The quick-release clip makes for easy removal from keychain or zipper, and the compact size means it won’t hog valuable space in your pocket or bike bag.

Features:

- 5 metric bit sizes: 2.5mm, 3mm, 4mm, 5mm, 6mm
- Ball detent locking mechanism for added security
- Zipper attachment for easy access
- Quick-release clip for swift removal

Specification:

Overall Length: 2.1"

Handle Material: 3Cr13

Product Description:
CRAMSTER Turtle Magnetic Tankbag

Description:

Looks like a turtle and sticks like a leech to your bike's tank. No it doesn't fall off ever. incredibly useful Motorcycle bag sits peacefully on your tank offering you unmatched utility and access to your stuff on the go.

Features:

- 15~ Litres (expanded).
- Plus additional pockets for quick access of Cameras,Lighters, gloves etc.
- Plus Map-Flap - Transparent sheet slide to keep Maps, stationary etc.
- Plus a Rain Cover to protect your fragile stuff during heavy rain.
- Plus Shoulder Sling makes it double up as an office bag**.
- Big enough to hold a Full face Helmet**.

Specification:

Easy Mounting: Keep the Turtle on the tank, pull the flippers and make them hug the tank as tightly as possible for the best grip and you are ready to go. To Remove pull the Flippers sideways and you got it in your arms. Since the design is common for all bikes, the magnets inside the flippers are movable by a couple of inches radius. helping you find that sweet spot on your tank for optimum mounting.
Fits:
- Royal Enfield (Any Model w/o Rubber Pads)
- Bajaj Pulsar,Discover,Avenger.
- Honda Unicorn
- Hero Honda CBZ/Extreme
- TVS Apache
- Yamaha RX100/RD350, etc.
Does Not work on: Non-Metallic Tanks like FZ - 16 | FAZER | KTM
Does Not Fit: Hero Honda Hunk and other bikes with excess plastic fairing on the Tanks.
Construction: Made of 600 Dernier Ribbed Polyester with Rubberized PVC Coating Plus Additional internal Nylon lining. Excellent Imported Industrial grade fabric, strong and being synthetic makes it more tolerant to variable weather conditions.
Fitting/Compatibility: Effectiveness of the Magnetic Tankbag is not the same on all the bikes, albeit it sticks to all Tanks. So before you order please confirm its fitting by contacting us or by the simple DIY tests below to avoid any regrets later.
To Gauge the effectiveness of the Turtle on your bike:
- Check the shape of your tank: Convex shape in the sides improves the grip of the Tankbag Along the running area (Tank height) should be at least 8 inches for the front Flippers and 6 inches in the rear to hug the Tank provide optimum grip.
- Check for extra fittings on Tank sides: Some Motorcycles (especially Royal Enfield) have Rubber Pads on the tanks which come in the way of the flippers and affect the sticking power of the magnets.

Product Name: GERBER Moment Sheath Folder - Drop Point - Hunting
Product Description:
GERBER Moment Sheath Folder - Drop Point - Hunting

Description:

When it comes to versatility and ease of carry, a full-size folding knife is both convenient and fully capable of undertaking field dressing and the diverse needs of a hunting trip. The Moment Large Sheath Folding Knife is a utilitarian tool for tasks big and small. From skinning to quartering, the 3.5-inch fine edge blade is designed for smooth engagement and firm cutting, while the molded rubber handle is designed for maximum comfort and a confident grip. Add the secure liner lock and you’ve got a seriously adept knife designed for in-pack or on-belt carry.
Instantly Familiar in Hand
Working with feedback from hunters about grip preferences, Gerber designed the handle to be inviting and ergonomic. Combined with its textured rubber surface, the knife is instantly familiar in your hand, and affords confidence for pushing and pulling actions associated with field dressing game, not to mention general camp duties like prepping your tree stand or stringing up a tarp. Gerber’s decades of experience building knives comes through in details like a well-placed guard, thumb traction jimping on the spine and a generous choil.
Everyday Carry Utility
A distinct advantage of this knife’s 3.5-inch drop point blade and folding design is its everyday utility. Firstly, it’s a capable hunting knife. But it’s a hunting knife that’s conveniently suited to everyday carry. The folding design is easily carried on a belt or a pack in its nylon sheath. From easy sharpening to carbon steel durability, the full-size blade is as practical as it is stout.

Features:

- Textured rubber handle feels great and delivers secure all-conditions confidence in your grip
- Folding design means this knife is easy to carry in its sheath
- Glass bead blade finish for low reflectivity and fewer fingerprints
- Pommel with lanyard hole adds utility
- 3.5-inch fine edge blade is the hunter’s friend; easy to use and utilitarian in nature
- Nylon sheath with metal snaps keeps your knife within easy reach and securely stowed
- Balanced feel and comfortable grip

Specification:

Overall Length: 8.5" (21.59 cm)
Closed Length: 5.13" (13.03 cm)
Blade Length: 3.5" (8.89 cm)
Weight: 5.6 oz. (158.76 g)
Steel Type: 5Cr15MoV
Handle Material: Nylon core with rubber overmold

Product Name: GERBER Myth Fixed Blade Saw - Hunting
Product Description:
GERBER Myth Fixed Blade Saw - Hunting

Description:

Cleaning and dressing large game is a serious project, and a portable fixed blade saw makes all the difference in getting the job done in a timely, effective fashion. Listening to veteran hunters, Gerber designed the Myth Fixed Blade Saw to meet the demands of cutting wood and bone. The combination of the saw’s fixed blade and T-handle give it a stout, confident feel for taking on both big game and diverse woodcutting needs.
Carbon Steel Optimized for Bone and Wood
With decades of hunting experience, Gerber knows that limiting the saw’s design to cutting bone would only hinder its functionality. The coated carbon steel blade is a hybrid, optimized for cutting both bone and wood. This means you can use it to prep wild game, as well as to trim branches and improve your shooting lanes—plus any variety of camping or survival-specific uses, from building a shelter to gathering camouflage.
Powerful, Ergonomic T-Grip
When it comes time to dress and prep an elk or moose, cutting through chest and pelvic bones demands power. This saw delivers with its ergonomic T-handle and sharp blade. The grip fits snugly and comfortably in your hand, allowing you to drive the saw with confidence, efficiently making cuts where needed. Product Name: GERBER Moment Fixed Blade - Drop Point - Hunting
Product Description:
GERBER Moment Fixed Blade - Drop Point - Hunting

Description:

When it’s time to dress your whitetail in the field, a fixed blade knife offers unmatched control, blade security and the all-around utility that hunting demands. From prepping game to setting up camp, the Moment Large Fixed Blade Knife is a utilitarian tool with a 3.63-inch fine edge drop point blade to handle tasks big and small. Add full tang construction and an ergonomic grip, and you’ve got a seriously capable knife that feels as great as it performs.
Comfortable and Balanced
The first thing you’ll notice when you handle this knife is the comfortable grip and balanced feel of its design. The ergonomic shape of its textured rubber handle is reminiscent of a familiar tool. The handle instills confidence for pushing and pulling actions, and feels secure in all conditions. A well-placed guard, thumb traction jimping and the choil speak to Gerber’s more than 60 years of crafting hunting knives. You can rest assured this tool has plenty of hands-on experience behind its feel and function.
Rises to the Occasion
No two hunting trips are the same. Each outing puts different demands on you and your equipment, your knife included. A versatile hunting blade needs to handle anticipated work like cleaning game and camp tasks, as well as the unforeseen prying and scraping duties that are sure to arise. The drop point shape allows for great control and ease of use, while its full tang design and glass bead finish are up for the unexpected demands of any hunting trip. The full-size blade is as versatile as it is stout, so you can focus on the adventure of the hunt, not whether you have the right tool for the job.
Rugged Nylon Scabbard
The Moment Fixed Blade slides easily into its nylon scabbard for safekeeping in your pack. Strap the sheath on your belt and your knife is within easy reach; there’s a metal snap closure to keep the knife securely seated where it belongs while you battle the brush to locate your game or find the perfect camp.

Features:

- Textured rubber handle feels great and delivers secure all-conditions confidence in your grip
- Full tang, fixed blade construction means this knife can rise to the challenge of long-term use
- Glass bead blade finish for low reflectivity and fewer fingerprints
- Pommel with lanyard hole adds utility
- Fine edge blade is the hunter’s friend; easy to sharpen and use, and utilitarian in nature
- Nylon scabbard with metal snaps keeps your knife within easy reach and securely stowed
- Balanced feel and comfortable grip

GERBER GDC Zip Blade - Essentials

Description:

Gerber knows being prepared isn’t a state of being so much as a philosophy. Which is why having the right tool on hand is about little things that make the difference. Sometimes the job’s as simple as cutting twine or slicing open a box, but try those things without a blade enough times and you’ll appreciate the compact efficiency of the GDC Zip Blade.
Part of Gerber’s Daily Carry collection, this Zip Blade is the bulldog of utility knives. Squat enough to fit in the palm of your hand, it has enough muscle to strip wire, cut cardboard, and slice through toughest of clamshell packaging.

A built-in fob lets you attach it to the zipper of your jacket or bag, so it’s close at hand when you need it.

Product Description:
GERBER Moment Pocket Folder - Hunting

Description:

Having a capable blade in your pocket at all times is part of being prepared. Pocket-size and utilitarian by design, the Moment Folding Knife is an everyday carry blade designed to complement your larger, more task-specific hunting knives. This handy Gerber knife is slim in profile and big on small details that make a difference in its performance and feel.
Slender Profile, Smooth Engagement
The slender stainless handle is well matched to its 3-inch drop point blade and, when closed, the knife slips naturally into your pocket. At only 2.5 ounces—half the weight of most smartphones—it won’t weigh you down either. The blade’s smooth engagement matches the refined look of the knife’s glass bead finish and clean, modern styling. Plus, it makes it easy to open and put to use for anything from cutting rope to gutting a fish.
The Right Details
Gerber’s decades of know-how designing knives shine in the clean simplicity of this folder’s features. A rubber inlay molded into the all-stainless design gives positive grip. Dual thumb studs allow for one-handed blade opening, while the otherwise clean handle offers a modest guard and useful thumb pad on the spine. Add a nicely machined frame lock, and you’ve got a blade that stays put for routine and unforeseen tasks.
Removable Pocket Clip
At exactly 4 inches long when closed, this knife is an easy addition to your daily wardrobe. Use the stout stainless steel clip to keep it securely accessible at the top of your favorite pocket, or remove it for a less-is-more approach.

Features:

- Textured rubber handles scales
- Dual thumb studs facilitate one-handed opening
- Glass bead blade finish for low reflectivity and fewer fingerprints
- Integrated frame lock provides bomber blade security
- 3-inch fine edge blade is versatile and easy to sharpen
- Stainless steel pocket clip keeps knife secure in pocket and is removable

Product Name: LAZER Monaco Window Pure Carbon - Gloss
Product Description:
LAZER Monaco Window Pure Carbon - Gloss

Description:

Superlight Tourer!
1.350 grams of pure lightness in carbon, making this the lightest modular helmet in the world. Standard equipped with the photochromic breakthrough Lumino visor, this helmet sets the new standard for biker comfort.

Features:

Want to know about the different models of LAZER Helmets? CLICK HERE

Specification:

Category: Modular
Level: Pro
Shell: Fibre
Shell Structure: Pure Carbon......What is Pure Carbon? The Carbon fiber is the most-used fiber in high performance applications. It is obtained by carbonization of the PAN fiber (Polyacrylonitrile). Lazer chose to use High Modulus (HM) fibers, obtained by a burning temperature of 1800 to 2000°C.
N° of Shell: 1
Weight (size L): 1.350 g.
Homologation:
- Double Homologation (Full-face and Jet)
- ECE 22.05
Buckle: Micrometric
Visor: Lumino visor (Photochromic) Pinlock® provided
To know more about Lumino Visor, CLICK HERE
Visor Fixation:
- Multi compressible tubular visor seal
- Quarter-turn screw
Number of reflective Zone: 3
Rear Reflector: Yes
EPS:
- EPS-Optimized upper insert protection
- Quadruple density internal shell......What is EPS? Just like the outer shell, the inner shell, typically made of EPS (expanded polystyrene), is built to absorb impacts. As it is in near-contact with the head, the inner shell needs to be softer so that it itself does not damage the head when absorbing an impact. Lazer typically uses a triple-density construction, so as to bring an optimal phasing in the absorption process, with denser EPS against the shell and looser EPS against the head. Again, just like with the outer shell, we want to create a gradual fracturing process, with consecutive yielding points.
Ventilation:
- Air Nets
- Full Air System (FAS)
N° of ventilations: 5
Interior:
- 100% removable and washable
- Morpho System Plus
- SILVERPLUS®, antimicrobial and ecological textile (in running change)
Comfort:
- Acoustic collar for noise reduction
- Flexible nose deflector
- Flexible removable chin curtain
- One hand easy opening
- Removable noise reduction pads
Helmet bag: Specific helmet bag
Communication system: Lazer Blue and Lazer Link pre-cabled
Guarantee: 5 years (2 years + 3 years if registered)
Option Set: LAZER Monaco Window Pure Carbon - Gloss

Product Description:
VIATERRA Claw Mini

Description:

A Mini version of the Claw.  A unique combination of a Saddle Bag + Tail Bag, it is an "All-In-One" motorcycle luggage system. It is a UNIVERSAL design that fits on ALL Made in India motorcycles.
The Mini Claw fits on the rear seat of all motorcycles including KTM Duke 200/390, Yamaha R15, FZ, Fazer, Honda CBR150R/250R, Kawasaki Ninja 250R/650R, Bajaj Pulsar 150/180/220/200NS, Avenger, Hero Xtreme, Hunk, Karizma R/ZMR, Impulse, Royal Enfield Bullet/Classic, TVS Apache RTR 160/80.
The Claw also is the perfect solution to carrying luggage on motorcycles with monoshocks, as there is no fear of the luggage touching the exposed rear wheel. Apart from being usable on virtually all kinds of motorcycyles, the Claw also fits perfectly on Harley Davidson cruisers and Imported Sports Bikes.

Features:

- 5 compartments: 1 main, 2 pockets on the sides, 1 pocket at the top for quick access, 1 mesh pocket inside the bag.
- 1.5” external metal D-rings (4 in no.) for looping bungee cords.
- Compression straps at top of the bag (to hold the stuff inside the bag snugly in place).
- Much more usable space than regular saddle bags.
- Can take in a 2/3 person camping tent, regular sized camera tripod, sleeping bag all at the same time.
- Shoulder strap (that can be removed while riding) to carry the bag when off the motorcycle.

Specification:

Mounting System:  
- Simple but effective three point mounting system using double D-rings.
- Two straps that loop through the rear foot peg stays (to secure the bag in place).
- One that goes under the tail lamp (to prevent the bag from sliding forward).
To learn how to mount your Mini Claw on KTM Duke 200, CLICK HERE
ViaTerra Mini Claw Specs:
- 35 Litres Storage Capacity.
- 1680 x 1680 Denier Synthetic Fabric.
- YKK Zippers.
- 3M Scothlite reflective material.
- Fittings sourced from ISO 9001 certified manufacturer.
Free Rain-cover: The ViaTerra Claw comes with a rain-cover that has a “seamless” construction. i.e it is constructed out of a single piece of lightweight water proof material, leaving no chance for water to seep in.

Product Description:
VIATERRA Claw

Description:

A unique combination of a Saddle Bag + Tail Bag, it is an "All-In-One" motorcycle luggage system. It is a UNIVERSAL design that fits on ALL Made in India motorcycles and most Imported motorcycles as well.
The Claw fits on the rear seat of all motorcycles including KTM Duke 200/390, Yamaha R15, FZ, Fazer, Honda CBR150R/250R, Kawasaki Ninja 250R/650R, Bajaj Pulsar 150/180/220/200NS, Avenger, Hero Xtreme, Hunk, Karizma R/ZMR, Impulse, Royal Enfield Bullet/Classic, TVS Apache RTR 160/80
The Claw also is the perfect solution to carrying luggage on motorcycles with monoshocks, as there is no fear of the luggage touching the exposed rear wheel. Apart from being usable on virtually all kinds of motorcycyles, the Claw also fits perfectly on Harley Davidson cruisers and Imported Sports Bikes.

Features:

- 5 compartments: 1 main, 2 pockets on the sides, 1 pocket at the top for quick access, 1 mesh pocket inside the bag
- 1.5” external metal D-rings (4 in no.) for looping bungee cords
- Compression straps at top of the bag (to hold the stuff inside the bag snugly in place)
- Much more usable space than regular saddle bags
- Can take in a 2/3 person camping tent, regular sized camera tripod, sleeping bag all at the same time
- Shoulder strap (that can be removed while riding) to carry the bag when off the motorcycle

Specification:

Mounting System:  
- Simple but effective three point mounting system using double D-rings
- Two straps that loop through the rear foot peg stays (to secure the bag in place) and
- One that goes under the tail lamp (to prevent the bag from sliding forward)
To learn how to mount your Claw on KTM Duke 200, CLICK HERE
ViaTerra Claw Specs:
- 55 Litres Storage Capacity
- 1680 x 1680 Denier Synthetic Fabric
- YKK Zippers
- 3M Scothlite reflective material
- Fittings sourced from ISO 9001 certified manufacturer
Free Rain-cover: The ViaTerra Claw comes with a rain-cover that has a “seamless” construction. i.e it is constructed out of a single piece of lightweight water proof material, leaving no chance for water to seep in.

Product Description:
DIRTSACK Frogman Waterproof Saddlebag

Description:

FROGMAN is here.

100% Waterproof/Immersion-proof/Dunk-proof/Submersible… what have you? welded PVC Saddle bags that allow you to plan dry rides and pack without a care for ‘what if the heavens open up’ scenarios. Come what may anything inside a Frogman will come out D R Y! that’s a promise… and we’ve tested and ridden these bags through hell.. to say so!

Features:

- 100% Waterproof / Dustproof / Weatherproof, welded PVC Rolltop Bags
- Extreme Durability 900 denier Poyester / Nylon / Rubber - exterior Harness
- Adjustable link bridge on harness allows flexibility to  mount bags on almost all bikes, regardless of pillion width. Reinforced with Industrial Velcro and secure webbing.
- Universal Fit – Suitable for all Bikes well almost!, with or without upswept exhausts
- Quick release snap fit buckles allow for easy mounting and dismounting
- Multiple restraint straps for a ‘0’ displacement fit.
- Zippered Exterior pocket on each side – Water Retardant / Not Waterproof – to store easy access tools, toilet kit or anything that needs no protection from water.
- 3m – 500 cd lux high visibility reflective tapes on 3 sides for safe low light / night riding
- Automotive / Aviation (seatbelt specs) grade 100% nylon webbings (straps)
- Heavy duty ykk zippers & slides on exterior pocket.

Specification:

Dimensions:
Harness - 40cm wide x 20cm deep
Dry Bag - 40cm wide x 20cm deep x 32cm tall when packed to optimum capacity. Rolltop design allows an additional 10cm of height if needed.
Capacity: 28 litres per side used at optimum storage capacity

Product Description:
QUECHUA Symbium 50 Easyfit Lady Backpack

Description:

Men on LONG DISTANCE HIKES over 2 to 3 days in all weathers. Automatic back adjustment! For men.

Features:

Specification:

Capacity: 51 litres / 1,95 kg / h 69 x w 36 x d 32.
Easy Storage: Pockets: 1 in, 3 ext + mesh pockets, 1 in belt. Front access with wide zip.
Anatomic Design: Automatic back adjustment. Carrying system designed for women.
Efficiency: Freedom of movement. "Air cooling" certified ventilation. Rain cover.
Full Pack Dimensions: 66 x 35 x 29 cm (Height x Width x Depth).
How to pack a Backpack: Put your bedding in the bottom. Put heavy gear (tent, portable stove, food) near the back. Pack your clothes around these items. The groundsheet should be placed under the flap and the tent beneath the pack if there is no space inside. Keep a rainproof jacket and fleece close to hand. Small items for daily use (sun cream, map, glasses...) should be placed in the pockets. Usually, there is a compartment along the back for a hydration pack.
How to adjust the back Height: Position the adjustment at the appropriate assumed height then adjust the bag (see "How to adjust your bag?"). With the belt on your pelvis, the straps should go round the front part of your shoulders, and the load adjuster straps (sometimes also height-adjustable) describing an angle of around 45° (they must not go horizontally or vertically). If, in the test, the back seems too short or too long, readjust and try again, until you are satisfied.
Symbium 3 System: The Symbium 3 combines the advantages of the Symbium (freedom of movement) with those of the new exclusive system of 3 pockets easy to move to the front of chest: easy to access multiple objects during walk, and shifting weight towards the front when these pockets are positioned at front. Consequently this helps to better distribute the carrying load and therefore raise the back by approx. 4 degrees. This reduces stress placed on the back and the load is carried with greater ease.
Composition:
- Outer fabric: 100% PES
- Inner fabric: 100% PA
- Padding: 100% polyurethane.
Restricted Use: Carrying to check if you are more than 1.8m (5ft 11 inches) tall
Storage: Store your bag in a dry place.
Care Instructions: To ensure materials retain their properties (especially waterproofing), we recommend you do not machine-wash backpacks, do not tumble dry, dry clean or use bleach. Do not iron. To clean your backpack by hand, use warm soapy water and a brush if necessary. After a few years, you can re-apply the water repellent properties of the fabric using a waterproofing spray.

Product Description:
CRATONI Bicycle Helmet Bullet

Description:

Road cyclists are true weight fetishists. With the new BULLET, CRATONI makes the dream of a sensationally lightweight road helmet at a moderate price come true. At a weight of just 175 g, the BULLET comes out on top of the international competition. A polycarbonate reinforcement at the rear of the helmet makes up for additional safety. The outstanding ventilation performance, aerodynamics and not least the design satisfy requirements at the highest professional level.

Features:

- Reflectors for better visibility.
- Incl. COOLMAX® spare pads.
- Polycarbonate reinforcement.
- Triple height adjustment.
- Strap Dividers for easy handling.

Specification:

Ventilation:  23 Air vents.
Weight:  200g.
LFS - Light Fit System: The aim was to develop a system that holds the helmet quickly, safely and yet more comfortably against the head. The adjustment mechanism is particularly small and light; it is effortlessly simple to adjust the size using just two fingers. In addition, the height of the LFS can be vertically adjusted to three positions, guaranteeing an optimal fit. Perfect arrangement of the straps ensures unrestricted wearing comfort for men and women. Higher performance with a 15% reduction in weight for a 100% more efficient system!
Light Weight Technology: CRATONI light weight design combines low weight and great stability.
Air Channel Technology: Due to an inner vent channel system the perfect flow of incoming and outgoing air is guaranteed and leads CRATONI helmets to outstanding ventilation results.
Impact Carcass Technology: The overall helmet structure is reinforced through an additional inner carcass.
Inmold Technology: The EPS material is directly foamed into the outer shell which makes up for a perfect fusion of the two materials. As a result, an extremely safe and solid overall-construction develops and weight is kept at a very low level.
Netpad - Changeable: Decide on your own wether to use an Insect Protection or not. Be on the safe side in any case with your optimal insertable insect net.
Coolmax® Pads: Keep a cool head on hard climbs thanks to the good ventilation performance and the breathable COOLMAX® inner lining.

Product Description:
CRATONI Bicycle Helmet C-Flash (2014)

Description:

Sporty weight wonder. Our newly developed C-FLASH is a sporty all-rounder which copes also with difficult terrain and accompanies its carrier safe and comfortable on the way to the summit. The C-FLASH’s low profile shape at the back offers additional safety also when riding down reckless trails and is an optimum of good value and performance.

A continuous downshell and breathable inner pads ensure longevity. Our C-FLASH comes with 19 big air vents, a detachable visor and our approved triple height adjustment system.

Features:

- Reflectors.
- Inmolded insect protective net.
- Triple height adjustment.
- Downshell with profile for incoming air flow.
- Strap dividers for easy handling.
- Ratchet buckle inclusive chin pad offer high wearing comfort
- Anatomic Fit System provides a flexible size adjustment
- Clean Tex pads

Specification:

Weight:  230 g.
Ventilation:  21 Air vents.
Downshell: The downshell is an extension of the outer shell on the underside of the helmet. This helps to prevent the occurrence of scratches and dents and thus to extend the life of the product.
LFS - Light Fit System: The aim was to develop a system that holds the helmet quickly, safely and yet more comfortably against the head. The adjustment mechanism is particularly small and light; it is effortlessly simple to adjust the size using just two fingers. In addition, the height of the LFS can be vertically adjusted to three positions, guaranteeing an optimal fit. Perfect arrangement of the straps ensures unrestricted wearing comfort for men and women. Higher performance with a 15% reduction in weight for a 100% more efficient system!
Clean Tex Pads: CRATONI Clean Tex Pads are treated antibacterially and therefore prevent the rise of bacteria within the helmet. As a consequence, longevity and long-lasting hygienic freshness is achieved.
Inmold Technology: The EPS material is directly foamed into the outer shell which makes up for a perfect fusion of the two materials. As a result, an extremely safe and solid overall-construction develops and weight is kept at a very low level.
Netpad - Changeable: Decide on your own wether to use an Insect Protection or not. Be on the safe side in any case with your optimal insertable insect net.

Product Description:
COLD KILLERS Hot Socks

Description:

The Cold Killers Softshell collection has been re-engineered with a focus on style, fit, soft feel and overall comfort.

The new collection features Softshell fabric providing active stretch, windproof and breathable performance combined with great water resistance. The Softshell fabric is a three ply laminate with a very tough and tightly woven stretch fabric on the outside with a cosy 3D fleece liner. In between is a laminated membrance, which assists weather protection.

These three elements work together to deliver an incredible balance of protection against wind and rain, excellent breathability, balanced wamth and soft stretch fit.

The technical combination of Softshell fabric and 3D fleece allows warm air to circulate easily, thereby dramatically reducing the overheat/chill-down cycle associated with conventional layering.

Features:

- Flat seams and stretch ankle panels ensure a superior fit.
- 100% windproof fabric which prevents wind chill in this vunerable area.
- Rear stretch panel for easy fitting and comfort.
- Water resistant.
- Superior breathability
- Extremely thin and flexible
- Washes easily
- Lightweight

BTWIN VIOO LED Rear Lights

Description:

Designed for cyclists to be illuminated at night. The lights have a continuous and flashing mode.

Specification:

Battery Life:
- 44 hrs in Flash mode
- 32 hrs in Normal mode
Easy Mounting: Universal attachment mode on bike (handlebar, etc.) or rider (helmet, etc.)

Product Description:
QUECHUA Wedze Mideet Down Lady

Description:

Designed for skiers and snowboarders looking for additional warmth. Feathers provide warmth and stretch!
The MIDEET is a mid-layer jacket used under a ski jacket. It is very warm, because we have used down, guaranteed to provide warmth. The Mideet is also very lightweight and compressible given that it fits in the inside pocket making this jacket more compact for storing away in a bag or at home. The jacket's arms and sides are made of stretch for freedom of movement.

Features:

Specification:

Thermal Insulation: 80% down and 20% feather chest filler.
Moisture Transfer: Chest and arms component assist with moisture wicking.
Low weight / Lightweight: Mainly down and feather composition.
User Comfort: Stretch panels give you freedom of movement. Soft feel fabric on arms.
Easy Care: Machine wash at 30°. Suitable for tumble drying.
Composition:
- Main fabric: 100% polyester (recycled).
- Outer fabric and lining: 100% polyamide
- Arm fabric: 91% polyester, 9% eslastane.
- Filling: 80% down, 20% feathers.
Stock Advice: Make sure garment is completely dry before storing in dry and ventilated place.
Care Instructions:
- Synthetic cycle at 30°C with just a little detergent. Put 2 tennis balls in the wash to aerate the down.
- Rinse twice.
- Tumble-dry on a synthetic cycle with 2 tennis balls to aerate the down.
- May also be dried flat. The down should be positioned on a clothes horse so that there is fresh air on both sides. Turnover and pat the jacket so that the feathers do not bunch up. Leave it to dry for at least 4 days.
