- Do not hang your bike from the back wheel in the vertical position.

Product Description:
PROVIZ Reflect 360 Cycling Jacket Mens

Description:

The REFLECT360 cycling jacket is the world's first to be designed using a 100% reflective outer-shell. The jacket's high quality material is designed to look and feel great while keeping the weather out. The reflective ability of the material helps other road users to identify a cyclist’s position on the road at night giving them an extra few seconds of time to react and manoeuvre appropriately.

The REFLECT360 jacket incorporates multiple vents - front, shoulder/back and under arm. This allows the user to regulate body temperature. By opening the front zipper vents a 'through-flow' is achieved. The air enters the front vents, cools the body and exits via the shoulder/back vents. During the winter, the vents can be closed and are designed to also be used as extra pockets if required. These features enable the jacket to be used all year round.  The jacket also has an inside chest pocket and large lower back pocket to store an extra layers or a map.

Features:

- 100% reflective outer-shell
- Highly water-resistant
- Built in air vents to keep ventilated (front, under-arm and shoulder/back)
- Fleece-lined comfort collar
- Adjustable waistband and velcro cuff
- Water-repellent storm zip
- Seam-sealed for extra waterproofing
- Inside chest & back pockets
- Low profiled rear spray guard
- Inside mesh lining for added comfort
- Machine washable
- Approx weight (size variable) - 500g

Specification:

Fabric: The fabric used for the REFLECT360 range is highly technical. During daylight it is a modest grey colour. At night, when the fabric picks up an external light source, eg vehicle headlights, it gives ‘astonishing reflectivity’ (quote: Cycling Active Magazine Sep:2014). The material is CE EN 20471 certified.

Product Description:
QUECHUA 2 Seconds III Air Tent

Description:

Designed for 3 hikers looking for an instant pitch tent with excellent ventilation.

Features:

Specification:

Weight: 4.6 Kg
Size: Bedroom: 2.25m long x 1.95m wide.
Poles: Solid fibreglass; highly break resistant.
Capacity: Fine for 3, great for 2. 2 big adjustable ventil. flaps (Air Cooling System®).
Easy to Use: Instant pitching. Can be folded in 15 secs if you have the knack. Free-standing.
UV Protection: Our tent fabrics block over 98% of UVB and 80 to 95% of UVA rays... for those looking for daytime protection, remember that a lot of UV rays can enter through one open door.
Composition: PU-coated polyester flysheet, breathable polyester bedroom, polyethylene groundsheet, solid fibreglass poles.
Ventilation: Air Cooling System label: 2 side panels on the flysheet can be opened up, allowing air into the bedroom through the mosquito netting (so the bedroom remains protected from insects). These panels can be left open even in the rain, and can be closed from the inside. This means that you get a good night's sleep on even the warmest of nights. It also allows you to safely see what's going on outside.
Care Instructions:
- CLEANING: if need be, clean the tent with soapy water then rinse (with a hose if possible). Then dry completely.
- RESIN STAINS (very hard to remove): once the stain is dry, gently scratch it off whilst holding an ice cube on the inside of the fabric to make the resin brittle so it will come off more easily.
- STORAGE: after use or cleaning, do not store your tent until it is completely dry to prevent odours and mould formation.

Product Description:
QUECHUA Raincut Overtrouser Lady

Description:

Effective backup protection from the wind and rain during your LOWLAND HIKES. Waterproof, breathable and lightweight overtrousers. Fits easily in your bag and complements your waterproof jacket to keep you totally dry in a shower.

Features:

Specification:

Composition: 100% polyester.
Breathable: NOVADRY hydrophilic coating (RET=12):limits condensation inside the garment.
Waterproof: NOVADRY waterproof coating (2000 mm). 100% Taped Seams.
Care Instructions: Wash at 30°C. Use liquid detergent; do not add fabric conditioner. Fasten zips and rip-tabs before washing. With each wash, renew the fabric's water repellent properties using a suitable treatment. A complete range of products specially designed to help you care for waterproof and breathable fabrics is available in all Decathlon stores. These products will help you optimise your garment's performance throughout its lifespan.
Compact: Light and compact garment for the bottom of your bag.
Easy to use: Zip hems for easy dressing without having to take off your shoes.
Tested: All our models are tested by users representative of our target market in conditions identical to those you will encounter yourself when using them. We believe that testing the product in real situation scenarios is the only way to design and constantly improve the technical suitability and style of our QUECHUA products.
Water repellence: Water repellency is a fabric's ability to let water slide over its surface without seeping in. This prevents the fabric from swelling, and keeps it lightweight, breathable and warm. Water repellency is achieved through a treatment applied to the fabric's exterior. This treatment must be renewed throughout the garment's lifetime (after every wash).Water-repellent treatment products are available in our stores. All Quechua waterproof jackets have received a water-repellent treatment.
Size: Wide cut. N.B. no seams possible because of the zips at the bottom of the legs.
Pockets: 2 hand pockets.
Stock Advice: Always make sure that this waterproof protective garment is completely dry before storing it.

Product Description:
QUECHUA S10 Ultralight Sleeping Bag

Description:

Sleeping in temperatures close to 10°C, while HIKING and BIVOUACKING. 10°C. Very good weight / warmth / volume ratio.

Features:

Specification:

Thermal Insulation: Comfort T°: 11°C, limit T°: 7°C (EN 13537). Zip flap to protect from cold.
Lightweight: L 0.95 / XL 1.03 kg.
Compact Design: Compression cover. Volume: 5.3 / 6.8 Litres.
Freedom of Movement: Mummy shape, wider at shoulder level. Non-slip zip.
Flexibility: Can be twinned to sleep 2 people. Link a right zip bag to a left zip bag.
Ease of Use: Synthetic wadding. Machine wash at 30°C. Quick drying.
Anatomic Design: Available in 2 sizes: L < 1m85 / XL < 2m
Sizes: L; 185 cm / XL; 200 cm.
Weight: 970 / 1030 g.
Folded Size: 15x 30 / 17x 30 cm.
Folded Volume: 5.3 / 6.8 Litres.
Twinning: The R (Right) indication corresponds to a sleeping bag on which the zip is on the right. The L (Left) indication corresponds to the left side. To twin 2 hiking sleeping bags you must choose a L sleeping bag and a R sleeping bag. The twinning symbol can be found on the bottom left of the product picture.
Composition:
- Inner fabric: 100% polyamide.
- Outer fabric: 38% polyamide, 62% polyester.
Wadding: 100% polyester.
Storage: Easy storage: stuff it into its cover, feet first. To keep it fluffed up, which will ensure good thermal performance, remove its cover and store it somewhere dry.
Care Instructions: Wash your bag separately from other delicate clothes or colours, fasten rip-tabs, loosen the hood, use 1/3 of a dose of washing powder, and select a synthetics cycle at 30°C. For drying, stretch the bag out in a dry and well-ventilated place out of the sun and away from heat sources, or tumble dry at a low temperature. Tip: using a sleeping bag liner allows you to wash your bag less often so it will retain its thermal properties.

Product Description:
COLD KILLERS Underglove

Description:

The Cold Killers Softshell collection has been re-engineered for 2009 with a focus on style, fit, soft feel and overall comfort.

The new collection features Softshell fabric providing active stretch, windproof and breathable performance combined with great water resistance. The Softshell fabric is a three ply laminate with a very tough and tightly woven stretch fabric on the outside with a cosy 3D fleece liner. In between is a laminated membrance, which assists weather protection.

These three elements work together to deliver an incredible balance of protection against wind and rain, excellent breathability, balanced wamth and soft stretch fit.

The technical combination of Softshell fabric and 3D fleece allows warm air to circulate easily, thereby dramatically reducing the overheat/chill-down cycle associated with conventional layering.

Features:

- Moulded fingers ensure a perfect fit underneath most gloves.
- Windproof fabric covers the fingers ends that are vunerable to the cold.
- Deep cuff design for retaining warmth.
- Water resistant.
- Extremely thin, Lightweight and flexible
- Superior breathability
- Washes easily

Product Description:
AQUAPAC Puncture Patches – Airtight & Watertight

Description:

Cut a hole in your Aquapac? Don’t worry, now you can fix it!
Not just for Aquapacs. They're ideal for fast in-field repairs on tents, tarps, rain gear, fishing gear and more.
They instantly seal leaking seams, tears and pinholes, stop rips from spreading and act as an abrasion-resistant shield on high-wear areas.

Features:

- See-through / transparent.
- Pack of 5.
- Super-aggressive adhesive for long lasting repairs.
- Works on: canvas, neoprene, nylon, PU, rubber, TPU.
- Does NOT work on: PVC, vinyl.
- Airtight and Watertight.
- Just peel and stick – no messy glue.
- Instant adhesion.
- Unique composition stretches and recovers absorbing the force that causes ordinary repair products to fail.
- Made in the USA.

Specification:

Dimensions: 1.4in x 1.4in / 35mm x 35mm
Instructions:
- Clean and dry the damaged area
- Cut patch to shape
- Smooth over the tear
- Repeat on inside of bag if necessary

Description:

Designed for bivouacking at 0°C. A very good weight / warmth / volume ratio.

Features:

Product Description:
QUECHUA Arpenaz 300 Rain Jackets Wenge

Description:

Protection from the rain or wind and keeping you dry during your LOWLAND HIKES. Waterproof and breathable jacket. Its classic and elegant style and super-functional design will make you want to wear it every day... both on and off the hiking paths.

Features:

Specification:

Waterproof: NOVADRY waterproof coating (2000 mm). 100% taped seams.
Breathable: NOVADRY hydrophilic coating (RET=12): limits condensation inside the garment.
Flexibility: Detachable hood.
Hood: Removable using press studs. Height can be adjusted using an elastic drawcord and toggles. Adjustable depth using a rip-tab positioned at the back of the hood. Fitted visor provides good face protection.
Pockets: 2 hand pockets + 1 outer chest pocket + 1 secret Napoleon style pocket hidden under the main flap. All 4 pockets are zipped. Pockets are NOT waterproof.
Technical: Dual-material lining: Mesh around the upper body to enhance the garment's breathability / nylon around the hips to optimise ease of movement and resistance to wear.
Waterproofing Test: We measure a fabric's resistance to a column of water in mm (based on the ISO 811 standard). The higher the water pressure withstood, the more waterproof the fabric. A waterproof rating of 2000 mm means the fabric can withstand the pressure exerted by 2000 mm of water (the equivalent of a rain shower lasting for two hours).
Water repellence: A fabric is water repellent when it allows water slide over its surface without seeping in. This prevents the fabric from swelling, and keeps it lightweight, breathable and warm. This is achieved through a treatment applied to the fabric's exterior. This treatment must be renewed throughout the garment's lifetime (recommended with each wash). Water repellent treatment products are available in our stores. All Quechua waterproof jackets have received a water repellent treatment.
Composition: Outer fabric: 100% polyester. Lining: 100% polyester.
Tested: All our products are field-tested by users who represent the target market in conditions identical to those found in typical use. We consider that real situation scenarios are the only way to create and constantly improve the technical relevance and the design of our QUECHUA products.
Stock Advice: Always make sure that this waterproof protective garment is completely dry before storing it.
Care Instructions: Wash at 30°C. Use liquid detergent; do not add fabric conditioner. Fasten zips and rip-tabs before washing. With each wash, renew the fabric's water repellent properties using a suitable treatment. A complete range of products specially designed to help you care for waterproof and breathable fabrics is available in all Decathlon stores. These products will help you optimise your garment's performance throughout its lifespan.

QUECHUA S20 Adult Sleeping Bag

Description:

Designed for hikers under 1.85m tall who sleep in mild temperature conditions.

Specification:

Product Description:
QUECHUA Arpenaz 2 Tent

Description:

Designed for camping, backpacking for 2 hikers with lot of space. Free-standing dome structure: simple to construct and pitch.

Features:

Specification:

Dimensions: Room 120 cm wide by 205 cm in length. Max. headroom: 110 cm. Folded:Cylindrical storage case: 16cm diameter / 57cm long.
Durability: Wind resistance: validated in wind tunnels and on a rotating plate.
Easy to use: Flysheet to protect you from condensation. Free standing structure.
Capacity: Sleeping width: 60 cm/person. Pole curve design maximises space.
Poles: Hollow fibreglass poles (2 diameters Ø 7.9 and 8.5mm)
Pegs: 6 x 5 mm galvanised steel pegs for very good twisting resistance.
Weight: 2.4kg.
Storage: 2 pockets for storing you things in the bedroom.
Pitching / folding: Classic dome tent assembly: poles set up with the bedroom then flysheet fixed on top. Reverse movement to take it down.
Ventilation: 1 high up back vent space between the flysheet and the floor all round the tent: to allow air to circulate between the bedroom and fly sheet for more breathability and to limit natural condensation.
Entrance/exit: 1 vertical zip for the outer door. A "D" zip for the inner room. The entry way can be left open rolled up and fixed to the pole.
Windproofing: We test all of our tents in a wind tunnel and on a rotating plate to expose each side of the tent to the wind. A properly assembled tent with all the stays in position around the tent should remain habitable;e under wind speeds measuring 50 km/h at ground level.
UV Protection: The fabric flysheet filters UV rays with a SPF of 30. Please note: a significant amount of UV rays can enter through a single open door: protect your skin.
Composition: Flysheet: 2000mm schmerber PU-coated polyester. Bedroom: breathable polyester. Ground sheet: polyethylene. Fibreglass poles.
Restriction of use: Compatible with 2-person mattresses with max width 120cm.
Care Instructions:
1) CLEANING - if needed clean the tent with soapy water then rinse (with a hose if possible). Then leave to dry completely.
2) TREE SAP STAINS - Can be very hard to remove Once the stain is fully dry gently scratch it off while holding an ice cube on the inside of the fabric to make the sap brittle so it will come off more easily.
3) STORAGE - after use or cleaning do not store your tent until it is perfectly dry to prevent odours and mould from forming.

Product Description:

Product Description:
COLD KILLERS Hot Hood Balaclava

Description:

The Cold Killers Softshell collection has been re-engineered for 2009 with a focus on style, fit, soft feel and overall comfort.

The new collection features Softshell fabric providing active stretch, windproof and breathable performance combined with great water resistance. The Softshell fabric is a three ply laminate with a very tough and tightly woven stretch fabric on the outside with a cosy 3D fleece liner. In between is a laminated membrance, which assists weather protection.

These three elements work together to deliver an incredible balance of protection against wind and rain, excellent breathability, balanced wamth and soft stretch fit.

The technical combination of Softshell fabric and 3D fleece allows warm air to circulate easily, thereby dramatically reducing the overheat/chill-down cycle associated with conventional layering.

Features:

- Windproof neck with breathable head is the ideal helmet liner.
- Contoured design for a smooth and comfortable fit.
- Close knitted mesh covering the scalp ensures extra ventilation and breathability.
- 100% windproof front and back.
- One size fits all.
- Machine washable and dries quickly

Specification:

Breathable: Allows the bodies natural heat to escape through the fabric.
Water Resistance: Resists water and rain but seam may let water through.
Windproof: Impervious to wind and will not let the cooling effect of wind through.

Product Description:
QUECHUA Base Seconds

Description:

A FAMILY of 4 to 6 BACKPACKING HIKERS who need a quick set-up living area offering shelter from the weather. A living area big enough for 4 to 6 people and which can be pitched in 2 minutes. Provides a protected living space when using small camping tents.

Features:

Specification:

Capacity: 2m height x 5sq m: room to stand and plenty of space for 4 seated at a table.
Ease of Use: Doors with mosquito screens protected from the rain by overhangs.
Easy Pitching / Taking Down: Pitched in 2 minutes.Folds down in less than 2 minutes (with the practise).
Dimensions: 2.25 sqm living area, 5 sqm surface, max headroom 1.9 m.
Weight: 6.4 kg.
Bedroom Space: This Base Seconds was designed as the living area for 2 Seconds tents, during cold, rainy, or mosquito-filled evenings. It therefore does not have a bedroom, but is compatible with 2 Seconds bedrooms. A bedroom is sold separately to fix inside the Base Seconds, converting it to a wide 2 to 4-man tent for sleeping.
Living / Storage Space: Thanks to its 5 sqm surface, 4 or 6 people can easily sit around a table. A compatible groundsheet is sold separately. All Base Seconds tents can be twinned together, or with a Base Seconds Full or even a Base Seconds XL, extending the sheltered area from 5 to 10 sqm or 15 sqm or more. See demonstration video.
Access: 2 big doors, which fold easily into a pocket for more ease and to keep the living space open in fine weather.
Pitching/Folding: Pops up in 10 seconds, fully pitched in less than 2 minutes. Free-standing (can easily be moved even after it is pitched). It is advised to use the 10 pegs to ensure wind resistance. Take down in less than 2 minutes with practice.
Ventilation: 1 air vent under each of the 3 "overhangs", 4 mosquito net windows (can be closed off) + 1 ceiling air vent. Designed for optimum ventilation and to reduce natural condensation.
Poles: Solid fibreglass for excellent break resistance.
Tent: pegs 5mm galvanised steel pegs for good twisting resistance.
Cover: 85 cm diameter and 10 cm thick disc. Non-zip flap which is more practical, and 2 straps for occasional carrying.
UV Protection (protection against Ultraviolet rays): Our tent fabrics block more than 98% of UVB and 80 to 95% of UVA rays. If you're looking for protection during the day, remember that a lot of UV rays reflect off the ground and in through open doors.

Product Description:
QUECHUA Rain Cut Jacket

Description:

Designed for additional and highly effective protection from the rain and wind when RIDING, WALKING or HIKING. Its Lightweight, compact and waterproof: the extra jacket to take with you on all your riding / hiking expeditions.

Features:

Specification:

Waterproofing: Waterproof coating (2000 mm Schmerber test). Partly Taped Seams.
Flexibility: Cut edges without hem + non-fraying fabrics: can be cut to size using scissors. 1/2-zip collar opening, making it easy to get on/off.
Compact design: Very small when folded away into its pouch.
Hood: Adjustable with elastic drawcord + toggles.
Hem: Adjustable with an elastic drawcord + toggles.
Care Instructions: Do not use fabric softener. Machine washable at 30°C. Use a liquid detergent and do not use a fabric softener. Close the zips and touch'n'close tabs before washing. Restore the water repellent properties with a suitable treatment every 2 to 3 washes. A full range of products that are specially designed for maintaining waterproof and breathable fabrics are offered in all our stores. Their use will help optimise the performance and prolong the life of your garment.
Composition: 100% polyamide.
Weight: 200 g in size L.

Product Description:
QUECHUA T3+ Tent

Description:

Designed for backpacking camping for 3 hikers looking for lots of storage space.

Features:

Specification:

Composition: PU-coated polyester flysheet, breathable polyester bedroom, polyethylene ground sheet, 8.5mm diameter fibreglass poles.
Care instructions:
- CLEANING: if need be, clean the tent with soapy water then rinse (with a hose if possible). Then dry completely.
- RESIN STAINS (very hard to remove): once the stain is dry, gently scratch it off whilst holding an ice cube on the inside of the fabric to make the resin brittle so it will come off more easily.
- STORAGE: after use or cleaning, do not store your tent until it is completely dry to prevent odours and mould formation.
Ventilation: 2 high ventilations (front and back), space between flysheet and ground all the way round. Everything is designed so that air circulates between the bedroom and flysheet, for better breathability and to limit natural condensation.
Tent pegs: 5mm galvanised steel pegs for good twisting resistance.
Cover Tube: 25cm diameter/55cm long.
Dimensions: 2.1m x 2m bedroom. 1.1m storage bell end
Weight: 4.6kg.
Bedroom space: Inner tent is comfortable for 3 adults, very comfortable for 2.
Storage space: Generous storage bell end.
Door: The big door opens fully in a single movement, meaning you don't have to crawl into the tent , which you will soon come to appreciate.
Pitching/folding: Classic dome pitch: put up the poles with the inner tent, then add the flysheet to this structure and finally the bell end pole. To take down follow these steps in reverse.
Poles: 8.5mm hollow fibreglass poles.
Waterproofing: Like all Quechua tents, the waterproofing has been particularly well-developed, approved in lab tests (WHOLE TENT in a shower of 200 litres/h/m²!) and in field tests (polyurethane-coated polyester flysheet; 120g/m² polyethylene groundsheet; sealed thermo-bonded seams). You will note that a breathable polyester inner tent beneath the flysheet means no contact with the condensation that naturally occurs inside the flysheet.
UV protection: Our tent fabrics block over 98% of UVB and 80 to 95% of UVA rays... for those looking for daytime protection, remember that a lot of UV rays can enter through one open door.
Meta Description: Get your hands on the QUECHUA T3+ Tent. Buy it Online in India at LiveYourSport.com| Free Shipping and Massive Discounts
